code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import img_product from'../../Img/product.jpg';import'./product_cart.css';import{AppContext}from'../../AppContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCart=pros=>{const{ite}=pros;const{removeByid,updateSl}=useContext(AppContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product_cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img_product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"name_product_Addnumberproduct",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"name_productAnd",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:ite.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Color: gray // Size: M"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Addnumberproduct",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"group_cost",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Addnumber",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateSl(ite.id,-1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-minus"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"number",children:ite.Sl}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateSl(ite.id,1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-plus"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"cost",children:["$",ite.cost*ite.Sl]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"deleted",onClick:()=>removeByid(ite.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-trash"})})]})]})]});};export default ProductCart;
